reviews.review_msg: I'm a big fan of dmac. His collaboration course is one of the best courses I've taken at university. 10/10
One of the best profs I've ever had!
My favorite prof! The Simon Cowell of Contemporary Arts, he'll say what he thinks and he's rarely wrong. He's very helpful and his guidance is gold. I loved his class and his teaching.

Tell the world about this teacher! He's got good energy, high interest about what he's teaching, well knowledged in music dance, theatre, film and visual art. Knows what he's doing as an artist. Friendly, knowledgeable. Like factor is high, so I'm sad to see the a good teacher being pilloried in these stupid forums. He's good - let him teach!!!

a real wolf in sheeps clothing.  close minded, anachronistic, a very poor ability to work with people.  has bad anger management skills, is excessively athoritarian, yet feels like you should "open up" to him.  an absurdity at the sca.  avoid.
